I am excited to be on TWO panels at #GameSoundCon next week, about #Accessibility in #GameAudio from developer and consumer perspectives:
"Do You Count Spoons? We have to! - Making Game Audio Development Accessible" Oct 28th at 1:30pm and "A Panel on Audio & Accessibility" Oct 29th at 5:45pm ....
